job.title: Automotive Test Engineer
job.description:
Role Automotive Test Engineer

Work location Peachtree City, Georgia

Duration: 6-12 Months (Possible CTH after 3 Months)


Required skills:

• Bachelor\'s degree in Computer/Electronics/Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or related

• 2+ years of relevant experience in executing a test plan, identify gaps and developing simple test cases

• 2+ years of relevant experience in Automotive Domain Testing

• 2+ years of relevant experience in Automation Testing

• Experience in software testing for infotainment system or consumer electronics products

• Must have knowledge and experience of types of testing (e.g. normal, boundary, abnormal, load testing)
